evidence.claim: Health Care Associates utilizes AWS for reliable cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA guidelines to protect patient information.
Integration with EHR systems through FHIR standards is highlighted on their technology page.
Uses Azure for data storage and security services in health-tech applications.
Emphasis on real-time data processing demonstrates use of integration patterns like ETL.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities found.
